name: Dryas aka Dryad
description:
Supported Languages: English, Japanese

* by Online Machine Translation: 简化汉字, 繁體中文, 한국어, Italiano, Português do, Español, Français, Русский, Deutsch, Türkçe, Tiếng Việt, Indonesia, नेपाली, हिन्दी

This is love story between a male human and a tree-nymph and set in the fantasy world with motif of Greek myths.

One day, "Arche", he is a wonderer, lost in a thin forest.

He met a beautiful mysterious woman there and fell in love with her.

He don't know that her secret identity is a tree-nymph called "Dryas" aka Dryad.

- Play time is about 1 hour.

- You just tap the screen.

- Mini-games are also included.

- Made by Japanese.

- OST including music of this game out now!

Presented by "PunPudding"

(Independent game development team in Japan)
